Company name: National Crime Records Bureau, Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India
Job title: Head Constable (Finger Print), Central Finger Print Bureau
Qualifications required: Officials from Central Government or State Government or Union Territory Police Force meeting the following criteria: (a)(i) holding analogous post on regular basis in the parent cadre or Department or equivalent; OR (a)(ii) with three years' regular service in posts in the PB-1 Rs. 5200-20200/- plus Grade Pay of Rs. 1900/- in the parent cadre or department; AND (b) a pass in Matriculation from a recognised board.
Skills required: Two years experience in examination of finger print.
Age limit: The maximum age-limit for appointment by deputation shall not exceed 56 years as on the closing date of a receipt of applications.
Salary or compensation details: Level-3 in the Pay Matrix (Rs. 21700-69100/-) (Pre-revised Pay Band -1, Rs. 5200-20200/- with grade pay of Rs. 2000/-). Group 'C', Non-Gazetted, Non-Ministerial. Appointment on deputation basis. Period of deputation shall not ordinarily exceed three years.
Mode of application: Offline. Applications in the prescribed proforma (Annexure - II) alongwith APAR Dossiers for the last 5 years to be sent to: Assistant Director (Admn.), National Crime Records Bureau, Ministry of Home Affairs, NH-8, Mahipalpur, New Delhi-110037.
